logTemplate:
<%*
if (log.mode == "WORK") {
  if (!log.finished) {
    tR = `- Work [startTime:: ${log.begin.format("HH:mm")}] [endTime:: ${log.end.format(
    "HH:mm"
  )}]`;
  } else {
    tR = `- Work [startTime:: ${log.begin.format("HH:mm")}] [endTime:: ${log.end.format(
    "HH:mm"
  )}]`;
  }
} else {
  tR = `- Break  [startTime:: ${log.begin.format("HH:mm")}] [endTime:: ${log.end.format(
    "HH:mm"
  )}]`;
}
%>
